About Me

I'm a frontend web developer with knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and fundamental backend abillites such as NodeJs.

I graduate software engineer studies At "ORT College" in 2020.

I love creating beautiful, responsive websites that are both functional and user-friendly.

When I'm not coding, you can find me playing video games or hiking in the mountains.
